home.app-function: Single entry point for ordering voice services in your country
home.sponsor: Built on CIO Hybrid Cloud Powered by Red Hat OpenShift
home.question: What service or country are you looking for?
home.search-text: Click here to see all results in GVS search
home.find-right-service: Find the right services, check their availability,
home.find-right-service2: and then choose the way you connect and work together.
home.jabber-description: Cisco Jabber is a multiple platform soft phone application to make and receive phone calls.

footer.please consult: If you have additional questions about the GVS Portal, please refer to
footer.consult: This website supports Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, IE, Edge and Safari.

footnote.To make a request the Employee must exis: You must know the IBM serial number of the person for whom you are submitting a request.
footnote.You must know the IBM serial Number of t: In order to submit a request, the employee must have a completed BluePages profile (except for cancellation requests).
footnote.Only one request per employee per reques: Only one request type per employee is permitted at a time.

alerttranslation.digitserialnumber: Employee Serial Number should be of 6 characters
alerttranslation.moverequest: This move request will delete the current Jabber / Phone number and assign a new one. Select OK to proceed, Cancel to go back.
alerttranslation.serialnumbersareallowed: serial numbers are permitted to create
alerttranslation.selectjabbernumberdel: Please select the Jabber / Phone number being deleted.
alerttranslation.selectlocationsp: Please select the Jabber / Phone number Location
alerttranslation.Homeandmobilealert: The serial number you have entered does not belong to the selected office location. Please choose your correct location, or select Home and Mobile.
alerttranslation.usaschedule: Selecting Home and Mobile will result in your service being assigned a phone number in the 720 area code. If you wish to have a number local to your office, or if you'd like to retain your existing office number, please wait for your site to be migrated to CHCS/Jabber. The USA site migration schedule can be found

fixedphonenew.descriptioncharacters: Please provide a description (30 character limit).
fixedphonenew.entermacadd: Please provide the MAC address; only the following alphanumeric characters are permitted: 0-9, A-F.

fixedphonenew.enternewMACaddress: Please verify the MAC address; the information entered is the same as the current MAC address.
fixedphonenew.providethereasonforupdate: Please provide the reason for the update.
fixedphonenew.differentDescriptionasisalready: Please verify the phone description; the information entered is the same as the current phone description.
fixedphonenew.cos: Please select a class of service.
fixedphonenew.NoteCombination: Note: Combination of (0 to 9 , A to F) and Length:12

specialrequest.OnlyusetheSpecialRequest: Special Requests are used to manage additional services for an existing Jabber / Phone number; to indicate the need for a telephony-related consultancy; or to create/manage special services: secondary IDs, support group hotlines, and/or shared lines or hunt groups.
specialrequest.needstandardservice: For standard services such as the creation of a new Jabber / Phone number, please use the options in the sidebar menu. Do not submit a Special Request or it will be rejected.
specialrequest.SpecialRequestHCSmigratedsite: Special Requests related to voice services are only permitted for sites migrated to CHCS/Jabber. If you need to submit a Special Request for a non-migrated site, please use
specialrequest.HelpTMACtool: Help related to TMAC can be found

feedback.Donotincludeanypersonal: Please do not include any personal identifying or otherwise sensitive information in the text fields.
feedback.Onascale: On a scale of 0 to 10, how likely are you to recommend this service to a friend or colleague?
feedback.Caretotell: Care to tell us why? Your feedback will help us to improve.
feedback.Wearesopleasedthat: We are so pleased that you feel this way about Global Voice Services! Care to tell us why?
feedback.NoteThisfeedback: Note: This feedback only concerns the useability of the GVS Portal. For any other feedback, please use
feedback.Thankyoufeedback: Thank you for your valuable feedback!
feedback.feedbackchars: Feedback length should be more than 5 characters.
